title: Taras Kvaratskhelia House Museum
about: Taras Kvaratskhelia House Museum is located in Samegrelo, near the town of Tsalenjikha, in the village of Nakipu. It was founded in 1987. The museum has 95 exhibits. The materials preserved here include memorabilia of the Georgian scientist, one of the founders of the Georgian National Academy of Sciences, Taras Kvaratskhelia, as well as photo and documentary materials and scientific works related to his life and work.
